title: How to Modify Robots in Fallout 4

steps.headline: Purchase and download the Automatron DLC.
steps.description: This is the only DLC necessary to unlock what you need.

steps.headline: Play the game as you regularly would, until you reach level 15.
steps.description: This is the minimum level required to activate the DLC. A Quest will be added to your Pip-Boy, called Mechanical Menace. It will require you to listen to a caravan distress call on your Pip-Boy radio.

steps.headline: Travel to the location of the downed caravan.
steps.description: You will find a group of robots attacking a lone blue robot.

steps.headline: Destroy the other robots.
steps.description: Once they are all destroyed, talk to the blue robot, ADA. ADA will request your assistance in avenging the murdered members of its caravan.

steps.headline: Agree to help ADA, and it will give you the schematics to build a Robot Workshop.
steps.description: Travel to any settlement, and in build mode, look under Specials.

steps.headline: Build the Robot Workshop.
steps.description: At this time, you will probably only have the bare minimum amount of supplies required to build robots, so your choices will be limited.

steps.headline: As you play through the game, destroy robots and take their mods.
steps.description: You can use these mods to build your own robots.

steps.headline: Collect lots of scrap.
steps.description: You will need scrap for the resources to build.

steps.headline: In the Robot Workshop, begin building a robot.
steps.description: Select a category, fill in the mod or part you want to build, and move on to the next. When it is fully customized to your liking, save it.

text: Purchase and download the Automatron DLC. This is the only DLC necessary to unlock what you need. Play the game as you regularly would, until you reach level 15. This is the minimum level required to activate the DLC. A Quest will be added to your Pip-Boy, called Mechanical Menace. It will require you to listen to a caravan distress call on your Pip-Boy radio. Travel to the location of the downed caravan. You will find a group of robots attacking a lone blue robot. Destroy the other robots. Once they are all destroyed, talk to the blue robot, ADA. ADA will request your assistance in avenging the murdered members of its caravan. Agree to help ADA, and it will give you the schematics to build a Robot Workshop. Travel to any settlement, and in build mode, look under Specials. Build the Robot Workshop. At this time, you will probably only have the bare minimum amount of supplies required to build robots, so your choices will be limited. As you play through the game, destroy robots and take their mods. You can use these mods to build your own robots. Collect lots of scrap. You will need scrap for the resources to build. In the Robot Workshop, begin building a robot. Select a category, fill in the mod or part you want to build, and move on to the next. When it is fully customized to your liking, save it.
